description.title: About
description.descriptions: SAP SuccessFactors solutions comprise a complete human experience management (HXM) suite that helps you attract, develop, motivate, and engage a diverse, global workforce by delivering awesome experiences for every user and providing a global people platform for HR.

items.label: Support localized HR and payroll compliance
Consolidate total rewards data across pay, benefits and nonmonetary rewards

whatsnew.title: Event
whatsnew.header: Transform Workforce Experiences with SAP SuccessFactors HXM Suite
whatsnew.body: As announced at our SuccessConnect Las Vegas event in September, we are pleased to share our new strategic intent to help organizations reinvent human experiences in ways that accelerate business growth.

whatsnew.title: webinars
whatsnew.body: The Q4 2019 release includes the following release materials to help you learn about and adopt innovations faster than ever

whatsnew.title: Releases
whatsnew.body: For details and information on other enhancements in the Q4 2019 release, please see the full “Release Information Document” in our customer community.

bullets.text: Improved flexibility and control of core HR processes
Streamlined and automated applicant management workflow for recruiting
Enhanced information security controls for cloud services with ISO 27017 certification
Automated benefits administration and improved enrollment experience
Improved usability and performance of SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Service Center
Expanded reward and recognition options for SAP SuccessFactors Compensation
Streamlined application process in SAP SuccessFactors Recruiting
Improved user experience including new home page design, Recruiting search capabilities and modern Continuous Performance Management features and functionality
Enhanced chatbot, search and digital assistant activities
Continued addition of new localizations for employee central and SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Payroll
Unified and simplified administration across the SAP SuccessFactors suite, including controlled instance refresh and provisioning
